resources.string:
1. Username must be between 3-12 characters in length. 
2. Username must include only (a-z) and numbers (0-9). 
3. Password must be between 8-16 characters in length. 
4. Password must include only (a-z) and numbers (0-9). 
5. Password must include at least one number (0-9) 
 and one letter (a-z).
